element.name: mailserver
element.label: Mail host
element.key: Set the host that sends mail for this Splunk instance.

element.name: ssl_or_tls
element.label: Email security
element.key: Check with SMTP server admin. When SSL is enabled, mail host should include the port. IE: smtp.splunk.com:465

element.name: auth_username
element.label: Username
element.key: Username to use when authenticating with the SMTP server. Leave empty for no authentication.

element.name: auth_password
element.label: Password
element.key: Password to use when authenticating with the SMTP server.

element.name: allowedDomainList
element.label: Allowed Domains
element.key: Provide a comma-separated list of allowed email domains. Leave empty for no restriction.

element.name: hostname
element.label: Link hostname
element.key: Set a hostname for generating URLs in outgoing notifications. Enclose IPv6 addresses in square brackets (eg. [2001:db8:0:1]). Leave empty to autodetect.

element.name: pdf.logo_path
element.label: Optional logo image file location:
element.key:
Use this syntax: <app_name>:<path>
is relative to $SPLUNK_HOME/etc/apps/{app_name}/appserver/static
Example:
search:logo_images/image1
for
$SPLUNK_HOME/etc/apps/search/appserver/static/logo_images/image1
If no path provided, defaults to Splunk logo. If no app provided, defaults to current app.
